scripts.build: yarn run update-version && rm dist/* && yarn run webpack --env.ENVIRONMENT=production && cp dist/*.js dist/latest.js
scripts.build:staging: yarn run update-version && rm dist/* && yarn run webpack --env.ENVIRONMENT=staging && cp dist/*.js dist/latest.js
scripts.deploy: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile tweeker dist/ s3://tweeker-embed
scripts.deploy:staging: aws s3 sync --acl public-read --profile tweeker dist/ s3://tweeker-embed-staging
